title: INDEX TO VOLUME II, 1975 CONCORDANCE To enable the reader to determine at a glance the date and serial number of the issue of THE LANCET containing the required page reference REFERENCES AND ABBREVIATIONS All Societies and Associations are indexed under the heading Societies and Associations, and all Universities under the word Universities. (C) = Correspondence, (E) = Editorial, (MD) = Methods and Devices, (ML) = Medicine and the Law, (NE) = New Editions, (0) = Obituary, (P) = Parliament, (PR) = Pamphlets and Reports, and (R) = Review
